content: Artificial Intelligence and Sustainability | Hasso-Plattner-Institut Prof. Dr. Ralf Herbrich Artificial Intelligence and Sustainability The Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Sustainability group researches both the use of energy in developing AI as well as the use of AI technology in generating, storing and managing energy. This includes research into energy-efficient algorithms for solving basic AI tasks such as classification, ranking or planning & search, as well as the development and application of state-of-the-art AI methods to refined modeling of batteries to extend their working lifetime and the control of domestic energy consumption, necessitating research into computational privacy and explainable AI.
